frontmatter.title: Bouncing Ball: A C4D Animation Remake!

node.html: Experience the fun of recreating a classic bouncing ball animation with Cinema 4D, blending smooth motion and visual flair in this playful remake!
Join the oval spirit as she flip through a twisting forest of platforms, grabbing every coin in sight!
